last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 18
last_episode_to_air.overview: Sofia faces jail time to save her company and her marriage.

name: Hard
overview: A recent widow learns her deceased husband was in the porn production business and faces the challenge of saving the company she's inherited.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: In the wake of her husband's unexpected death, Sofia inherits a pornographic film company he was secretly running.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Sofia quickly discovers her law degree is outdated and selling SofiX won't be enough to pay the bills. Desperate to make ends meet and regain control of her life, she takes over Alex's position at the company, but her move to CEO comes with resistance from the staff, as well as a steep learning curve.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Sofia is disappointed with the quality of content SofiX is producing and decides to take things in a more serious direction. Marcello pitches an idea for a dramatic feature, but Pierre is resistant to the idea of changing the company's formula.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Sofia invites a theater director to the studio to help improve the staff?s acting abilities. Marcello asks Sofia out on a date. Lucia reveals her sex fantasy.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: After sleeping with Marcello, Sofia wonders whether she can have a relationship with a porn star. Pierre and Igor continue to fight over the direction of the movie. Lucia pitches an interesting business idea that may be able to save SofiX.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: Violeta finds out about the secrets her mother has been hiding. Sofia tries to move on from Marcello and starts dating again. Lucia sends more clients to SofiX but things quickly get out of hand.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Sofia is in control of SofiX but struggles to keep her career and love life a secret.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Sofia helps Marcello with his acting career, but he still doubts her commitment to their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Sofia's business idea pays off, but she receives bad news about both SofiX and her son.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Things seem to improve for Sofia once Marcello meets her family, but a secret threatens their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Sofia and Marcello break up and Violeta has an accident.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Sofia feels ready for her new life but an important production brings back some old insecurities.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Sofia brings in a new investor and receives important news about her health.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: Sofia backpedals on the company’s sale and her wedding plans, but it might be too late.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Sofia sets boundaries with Marcello and the kids while figuring out the future of SofiX.​

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Sofia struggles to keep her business legal.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Sofia faces jail time to save her company and her marriage.
